<p><a href="https://www.santander.com.br/tarifas-e-pacotes-pessoa-juridica?ic=solucaopraemp-tarifasepacotespj" title="Tarifas e pacotes de servios Pessoa Jurdica">Tarifas e pacotes de servios Pessoa Jurdica</a></p>

<p><a href="https://www.santander.com.br/consorcio?ic=portal-parasuaempresa"><u>Consrcio</u></a></p>

<p><a href="https://www.santander.com.br/seguro-empresarial"><u>Seguros</u></a></p>
</html-string-text></h4></dynamic-heading></product-paragraph-with-title><!----><!----><!----><!----></div></product-accordion-content></div></div></accordion-item><accordion-item _ngcontent-sc15="" index="index" _nghost-sc28="" class="-last-child"><div _ngcontent-sc28="" class="button"><product-accordion-item-button _ngcontent-sc15="" accordion-button="" _nghost-sc29=""><content-line-with-icon _ngcontent-sc29="" _nghost-sc32=""><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="row main"><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="col-10 row-content"><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="row group"><!----><div _ngcontent-sc29="" class="item-align col-11 col-lg-12"><dynamic-heading _ngcontent-sc29="" class="title title-color t-color" _nghost-sc34=""> Veja tambm <h3 _ngcontent-sc34=""></h3></dynamic-heading></div></div></div><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="col-2 arrow-container"><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="icon-wrapper"><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="icon-arrow-a-down icon icon-center"></div><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="icon-circle icon"></div></div></div></div></content-line-with-icon></product-accordion-item-button></div><div _ngcontent-sc28="" class="content-wrapper" style="height:0px;"><div _ngcontent-sc28="" class="content"><!----><product-accordion-content _ngcontent-sc15="" accordion-content="" _nghost-sc30=""><!----><!----><div _ngcontent-sc30=""><!----><product-paragraph-with-title _ngcontent-sc30="" _nghost-sc35=""><!----><dynamic-heading _ngcontent-sc35="" class="text-color h3-class" _nghost-sc34=""><h4 _ngcontent-sc34=""><html-string-text _ngcontent-sc35="" _nghost-sc40="">
<p><a href="https://www.santander.com.br/getnet/?ic=vejatbm-getnet" title="Mquina de carto Getnet">Mquina de carto Getnet</a></p>

<p><a href="https://www.cliente.santanderfinanciamentos.com.br/originacaocliente/#/simulacao?ori=SB&amp;utm_source=portal-comercial&amp;utm_medium=link-rodape&amp;ic=vejatbm-financeira" title="Financeira">Financeira</a></p>

<p><a href="https://www.santander.com.br/capitalizacao?ic=vejatbm-capitalizacao" title="Capitalizao">Capitalizao</a></p>

</html-string-text></h4></dynamic-heading></product-paragraph-with-title><!----><!----><!----><!----></div></product-accordion-content></div></div></accordion-item></accordion></div></div><!----></product-accordion></div></fullscreen-background><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><app-list </a></link-item><!----><!----></div><div _ngcontent-sc31="" class="col-12 col-lg-8"><accordion _ngcontent-sc15="" _nghost-sc27=""><!----><accordion-item _ngcontent-sc15="" index="index" _ngcontent-sc30="" _nghost-sc35=""><!----><dynamic-heading _ngcontent-sc35="" class="text-color h3-class" _nghost-sc34=""><h4 _ngcontent-sc34=""><html-string-text _ngcontent-sc35="" _nghost-sc40="">Consultas, informaes, transaes e cancelamentos.<br>
4004 3535 (capitais e regies metropolitanas)<br>
0800 702 3535 (demais localidades)<br>
0800 723 5007 (pessoas com deficincia auditiva e de fala)<br>
<br>
<strong>Central de atendimento empresarial</strong><br>
4004 2125 (capitais e regies metropolitanas)<br>
0800 726 2125 (demais localidades)<br>
0800 723 5007 (pessoas com deficincia auditiva e de fala)
</html-string-text></h4></dynamic-heading></product-paragraph-with-title><!----><!----><!----><!----></div></product-accordion-content></div></div></accordion-item><accordion-item _ngcontent-sc15="" index="index" _nghost-sc28="" class=""><div _ngcontent-sc28="" class="button"><product-accordion-item-button _ngcontent-sc15="" accordion-button="" _nghost-sc29=""><content-line-with-icon _ngcontent-sc29="" _nghost-sc32=""><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="row main"><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="col-10 row-content"><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="row group"><!----><div _ngcontent-sc29="" class="item-align col-11 col-lg-12"><dynamic-heading _ngcontent-sc29="" class="title title-color t-color" _nghost-sc34=""> Central de renegociao <h3 _ngcontent-sc34=""></h3></dynamic-heading></div></div></div><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="col-2 arrow-container"><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="icon-wrapper"><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="icon-arrow-a-down icon icon-center"></div><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="icon-circle icon"></div></div></div></div></content-line-with-icon></product-accordion-item-button></div><div _ngcontent-sc28="" class="content-wrapper" style="height:0px;"><div _ngcontent-sc28="" class="content"><!----><product-accordion-content _ngcontent-sc15="" accordion-content="" _nghost-sc30=""><!----><!----><div _ngcontent-sc30=""><!----><product-paragraph-with-title _ngcontent-sc30="" _nghost-sc35=""><!----><dynamic-heading _ngcontent-sc35="" class="text-color h3-class" _nghost-sc34=""><h4 _ngcontent-sc34=""><html-string-text _ngcontent-sc35="" _nghost-sc40="">4004 2262 (capitais e regies metropolitanas)<br>
0800 704 3722 (demais localidades)<br>
Pessoa fsica: atendimento de segunda a sexta-feira, das 8h s 21h. Sbados das 9h s 16h.<br>
Pessoa jurdica: atendimento de segunda a sexta-feira, das 8h s 19h (exceto feriados).
</html-string-text></h4></dynamic-heading></product-paragraph-with-title><!----><!----><!----><!----></div></product-accordion-content></div></div></accordion-item><accordion-item _ngcontent-sc15="" index="index" _nghost-sc28="" class=""><div _ngcontent-sc28="" class="button"><product-accordion-item-button _ngcontent-sc15="" accordion-button="" _nghost-sc29=""><content-line-with-icon _ngcontent-sc29="" _nghost-sc32=""><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="row main"><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="col-10 row-content"><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="row group"><!----><div _ngcontent-sc29="" class="item-align col-11 col-lg-12"><dynamic-heading _ngcontent-sc29="" class="title title-color t-color" _nghost-sc34=""> SAC <h3 _ngcontent-sc34=""></h3></dynamic-heading></div></div></div><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="col-2 arrow-container"><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="icon-wrapper"><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="icon-arrow-a-down icon icon-center"></div><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="icon-circle icon"></div></div></div></div></content-line-with-icon></product-accordion-item-button></div><div _ngcontent-sc28="" class="content-wrapper" style="height:0px;"><div _ngcontent-sc28="" class="content"><!----><product-accordion-content _ngcontent-sc15="" accordion-content="" _nghost-sc30=""><!----><!----><div _ngcontent-sc30=""><!----><product-paragraph-with-title _ngcontent-sc30="" _nghost-sc35=""><!----><dynamic-heading _ngcontent-sc35="" class="text-color h3-class" _nghost-sc34=""><h4 _ngcontent-sc34=""><html-string-text _ngcontent-sc35="" _nghost-sc40="">Reclamaes, cancelamentos e informaes gerais: 0800 762 7777 Atende tambm pessoas com deficincia auditiva e de fala pelo telefone 0800 771 0401 Ligaes do exterior (a cobrar): +55 (11) 3012 3336<br>
</html-string-text></h4></dynamic-heading></product-paragraph-with-title><!----><!----><!----><!----></div></product-accordion-content></div></div></accordion-item><accordion-item _ngcontent-sc15="" index="index" _nghost-sc28="" class=""><div _ngcontent-sc28="" class="button"><product-accordion-item-button _ngcontent-sc15="" accordion-button="" _nghost-sc29=""><content-line-with-icon _ngcontent-sc29="" _nghost-sc32=""><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="row main"><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="col-10 row-content"><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="row group"><!----><div _ngcontent-sc29="" class="item-align col-11 col-lg-12"><dynamic-heading _ngcontent-sc29="" class="title title-color t-color" _nghost-sc34=""> Ouvidoria <h3 _ngcontent-sc34=""></h3></dynamic-heading></div></div></div><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="col-2 arrow-container"><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="icon-wrapper"><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="icon-arrow-a-down icon icon-center"></div><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="icon-circle icon"></div></div></div></div></content-line-with-icon></product-accordion-item-button></div><div _ngcontent-sc28="" class="content-wrapper" style="height:0px;"><div _ngcontent-sc28="" class="content"><!----><product-accordion-content _ngcontent-sc15="" accordion-content="" _nghost-sc30=""><!----><!----><div _ngcontent-sc30=""><!----><product-paragraph-with-title _ngcontent-sc30="" _nghost-sc35=""><!----><dynamic-heading _ngcontent-sc35="" class="text-color h3-class" _nghost-sc34=""><h4 _ngcontent-sc34=""><html-string-text _ngcontent-sc35="" _nghost-sc40="">
<p>Se no ficar satisfeito com a soluo apresentada: 0800 726 0322.<br>
Disponvel de segunda a sexta-feira, das 8h s 22h, e aos sbados, das 9h s 14h, exceto feriado.<br>
Atende tambm pessoas com deficincia auditiva e de fala no 0800 771 0301.</p>

<p><a href="https://www.santander.com.br/atendimento-para-voce/telefones-santander/ouvidoria" target="_blank">Entre em contato com a Ouvidoria</a></p>

</html-string-text></h4></dynamic-heading></product-paragraph-with-title><!----><!----><!----><!----></div></product-accordion-content></div></div></accordion-item><accordion-item _ngcontent-sc15="" index="index" _nghost-sc28="" class=""><div _ngcontent-sc28="" class="button"><product-accordion-item-button _ngcontent-sc15="" accordion-button="" _nghost-sc29=""><content-line-with-icon _ngcontent-sc29="" _nghost-sc32=""><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="row main"><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="col-10 row-content"><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="row group"><!----><div _ngcontent-sc29="" class="item-align col-11 col-lg-12"><dynamic-heading _ngcontent-sc29="" class="title title-color t-color" _nghost-sc34=""> Caixas eletrnicos <h3 _ngcontent-sc34=""></h3></dynamic-heading></div></div></div><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="col-2 arrow-container"><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="icon-wrapper"><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="icon-arrow-a-down icon icon-center"></div><div _ngcontent-sc32="" class="icon-circle icon"></div></div></div></div></content-line-with-icon></product-accordion-item-button></div><div _ngcontent-sc28="" class="content-wrapper" style="height:0px;"><div _ngcontent-sc28="" class="content"><!----><product-accordion-content _ngcontent-sc15="" accordion-content="" _nghost-sc30=""><!----><!----><div _ngcontent-sc30=""><!----><product-paragraph-with-title _ngcontent-sc30="" _nghost-sc35=""><!----><dynamic-heading _ngcontent-sc35="" class="text-color h3-class" _nghost-sc34=""><h4 _ngcontent-sc34=""><html-string-text _ngcontent-sc35="" _nghost-sc40="">Veja os servios disponveis e localize <a href="/atendimento-para-voce/banco-24-horas-e-caixas-eletronicos"><u>aqui</u></a> o caixa eletrnico mais prximo

Ao continuar navegando voc&a;ecirc; concorda com a pol&a;iacute;tica de &l;a href=\&q;/institucional-santander/seguranca/sobre-o-uso-de-cookies\&q; target=\&q;_self\&q;&g;cookies&l;/a&g; e &l;a
